links_reviews_text: This romper is so pretty! It's a bit oversized but it's so comfy and perfect for around the house, but also pretty enough to wear out. I love the back! I'm only 4'11" and the length was perfect on me, not too long. My only issue is the front is a bit too low/wide, otherwise would purchase. You can adjust the straps in the back but it didn't seem to solve the issue in the front.
If I didn’t spend all day picking an uncomfortable wedgie, I would have kept this! It’s cute, but it rides up if you tie it up to hold up the front.

Did not pay attention that this was more of an empire waist. I look much better with things that are fitted at my natural waist. The fit is big. In most brands In most brands, I wear a large but often a M or even S in FP. The medium fit well.
I loved this piece. I wanted to buy it but wanted to also try the other patterns it offers. Its super comfortable, easy to dress up if needed.
I wanted to love this piece as a coverup but it was way too short for me. Lace up back detail is very cute.
Loved this. Wore it on Easter for pictures. Even with a few extra lbs from quarantine this one is forgiving. Very low cut, but I made it work.

This romper is so cute, perfect for warmer weather. Very flattering, has beautiful colors and detail and is very comfortable. I am usually a small in FP dresses/rompers, but could have probably sized down to an XS in this, as it runs large. Highly recommend!
Cute

This romper is so pretty! It's a bit oversized but it's so comfy and perfect for around the house, but also pretty enough to wear out. I love the back! I'm only 4'11" and the length was perfect on me, not too long. My only issue is the front is a bit too low/wide, otherwise would purchase. You can adjust the straps in the back but it didn't seem to solve the issue in the front.
If I didn’t spend all day picking an uncomfortable wedgie, I would have kept this! It’s cute, but it rides up if you tie it up to hold up the front.

Did not pay attention that this was more of an empire waist. I look much better with things that are fitted at my natural waist. The fit is big. In most brands In most brands, I wear a large but often a M or even S in FP. The medium fit well.
I loved this piece. I wanted to buy it but wanted to also try the other patterns it offers. Its super comfortable, easy to dress up if needed.
I wanted to love this piece as a coverup but it was way too short for me. Lace up back detail is very cute.
Loved this. Wore it on Easter for pictures. Even with a few extra lbs from quarantine this one is forgiving. Very low cut, but I made it work.

This romper is so cute, perfect for warmer weather. Very flattering, has beautiful colors and detail and is very comfortable. I am usually a small in FP dresses/rompers, but could have probably sized down to an XS in this, as it runs large. Highly recommend!
Cute

links_reviews_title: Too small for me to wear!
links_reviews_text: These are a pretty neutral color but the fit wasn’t right for my curvy shape. Didn’t fit but a little sad because love the idea and the flare was dramatic and they were actually long enough!

links_reviews_title: Pretty but didn't get to wear
links_reviews_text: I ordered this for a baby shower that got cancelled due to COVID so I didn't get the opportunity to actually wear it. It's very whimsical but with a little edge.

I picked out this dress for a black tie optional wedding in April - which is now cancelled (thanks covid19) - but I love it and will totally rent it again for a future wedding! I'm seriously considering wearing it for a date-night in because it fits perfectly with or without a bra, and it's so flattering! Highly recommend
It's a little short, but I'm 5'9" so take that into consideration. It's really cute tucked in with jeans!
Was too big but super cute - I am going to get a size smaller next month.
Seems short at first but grew on me. It was absolutely perfect and interesting to wear. Comfortable too!

This dress was SO FUN! I only wore it once since I didn't have much to wear it to, but I would have worn it over and over given the chance. It's definitely a short dress, but everything fit right. The sleeves are the only slightly annoying part as they are extremely billowy and can get in the way sometimes.
Cute dress but not so comfortable to wear, but def good for when you go out. Not for everyday dress.
It’s cute, light, and the perfect spring dress. I like the asymmetrical cut at the bottom. Decided to keep it since I only wore it around the house and dream of wearing it out post quarantine.

links_reviews_title: Cute, not sure about the waist tie
links_reviews_text: Nice print, linen fabric so light and breathable. Dress longer- so work appropriate

Every time I tried this dress on it felt like it was just a touch too much for whatever occasion I was dressing for. It's sooo fun for the right occasion and I might order it again in the future. The only funky things to note are the sleeve length (The seem to ride up to become more 80's style than the fun balloon look they're giving in the photo) and the cinched waist (it puffs out in a bit of an unflattering way). It's absurdly cute in photos, though. Highly recommend ordering if you're going to have your photo taken :).

1st - this has a zipper! It was hiding on me and when I first tried it on I thought "how the heck is this a medium". Once I found that zipper it was a perfect fit! this is a great short fit and flare with amazing colors that is sure to WOW! The sleeves were a bit aggressive, but added to the fun! I am 5'5" and 155 and it may have been a bit short for bending over - but that didn't stop me from enjoying every second of this dress!
I loved this dress, and so did everyone that saw it!! It def gets lots of compliments and attention. I wore this dress for my 40th bday photo shoot and it was perfect!

Loved this dress! It was a little fancy for me and you really do need to have an occasion to wear it. Fortunately I had a product shoot I had to take with my daughter for mothers day so it came out beautifully!

I LOVE this piece but didn't get to wear it out bc of Covid and Alaska weather. Sooo cute and the fabric is really pretty. I would never be able to wear as a dress, even with opaque tights it would be way too short. I styled it (for a picture, haha) with Jean's, loved it!
Short and too much material on the skirt section

Had a quarantine tea party and I was so glad to have this gem! This dress really is so special. The colors and fit are super cute and fun! I think I might've been able to size one size down. If you're in between sizes I think you could def go down but it's flattering either way!
I loved this dress! The sleeves were pretty poofy but the length of the dress made it fun instead of frumpy. It was super comfortable and wore it with some sneakers.

Everything fit fine and the dress was very cute with nice material and embroidery but the dress is far too short. I dont know who would actually be able to pull this off thats taller than 5’2. I love showing off my legs but its inappropriate for someone who is 25 to wear something that short. It also looks odd considering how much volume is on the top with the sleeves. If it were two inches longer then i would consider wearing it out. Its definitely unfortunate and wouldn’t recommend.

I’m a little more skeptical of items that are Urban Outfitters brand due to fit but these are SPECTACULAR! I’m usually a solid size 28 but sized up just in case. While I could have gotten away with the 28 I like the baggier fit of sizing up. Not overly baggy - the perfect straight boyfriend fit! I also hate thin denim and these have great quality thick denim!
Really liked these! The cuffed bottoms are super cute and the high waist hugs in all the right places.

This is a generously cut, unlined, linen blazer. It's comfortable and looks fine with a t-shirt underneath. If you're looking for crisp and tailored, this isn't it. But for a casual, oversized lived-in look, add this to your closet!
Not a good fit for my body. Drowned my small frame
Nice blazer but too big and boxy for me. Wore once.
Lovely chic relaxed blazer
Material was thin and overall fit was boxy and large. No tailoring.
Fit great, fun colors

This skirt is so comfortable and chic! You can style it with any top, and is the perfect thing to wear to work or out on the town. It does have an elastic waistband so if you like it a little snugger I would size down. For example I am a 27/28 and I got a small.
This fit perfect! It was a fun skirt and so easy to throw on and look put together. Would definitely recommend as it can be dressed up or down.

This skirt is beautiful and so fun! Bright and colorful. Just the right length. I am 5’4 and got the petite version and the length was perfect. I bought this because it is so pretty and could be worn so many different ways!
I wore this skirt constantly. Perfect picnic skirt. :)

I loved the pattern of this skirt, but the elastic waistband was a bit cheap feeling, and it was sewn in a way that it bubbled at the top and was not flattering. Still would have worn it if COVID didn't get in the way as it was very cute and summery!
An easy to style and bright skirt for easy Sundays and work.

links_reviews_title: Feel Like a Jane Austin Character
links_reviews_text: Nightgown-level comfy, pretty back details and the waist-band/ chest fabric is thick enough that you can go braless. Great summer dress
Fit perfectly. High waist. Not too deep a v neck. Lined. Easy to wear to work and to parties.
This dress was just okay. I am a B cup and the neckline of this made me look insanely boobalicious. I won’t rent again.
This is such a beautiful dress! It fit so well and was very comfortable! Very tempted to buy.
Nice and long in petites without having to wear heels! Beautiful, stretchy, soft fabric and the band minimized my poofy tummy enough. Got so many compliments I decided to keep it.
Very cozy but not great for larger chested people like me. Wish it wasn’t so low cut. Otherwise very pretty pattern.
Beautiful dress! Slightly low cut but very flattering !
This is absolutely the most perfect dress. It fits perfectly, and will be a summer staple. The only thing that would make it better are if it had pockets!

I bought it. I love this dress so much. I'm 5'4" and 32/30/40. I got a medium, and it fits like a dream. It's double-lined with heavy quality fabric. It has a little stretch to it. It's soooo comfy, and very flattering. The back shows a little skin, but still manages to cover the straps of a balky t-shirt bra. There's just no fuss to this dress, and it's comfortable enough to sleep in.

links_reviews_title: Flattering but to long for me
links_reviews_text: This dress is a nice option for spring/summer. Flattering fit but way to long. Even a pair of wedge sandals probably won’t help my 5’3 frame. Maybe I can pin it. If you are 5’6 or taller, this will be a great option. I am commonly a 1x in Anthro and this 1x fit fine. Glad to have it but probably won’t purchase.
Loved this, te open back had a strip right at bra level - great design!

I wore this several times, which I would not have guessed the first time I tried it on. I rolled the sleeves up almost always because I found them a little in the way. It is sheer. Considered buying, the more I wore it the more I loved it. Has enough structure to tuck in front but not back, or on one side only. Versatile to construct a look.
The sleeves were long on me but otherwise this top is so pretty. I paired it with a pair of jeans and booties. Just perfect!
Loved this top. It has really pretty lace like details. It is on the sheer snide. The sleeves were a little long on my but it wasn’t anything to stop me from wearing the top!

links_reviews_title: Just not ye right fit for me
links_reviews_text: Cute but just didn’t flow right on my body
Loved this item so much that after the first wear I needed to keep it.

I wore this several times, which I would not have guessed the first time I tried it on. I rolled the sleeves up almost always because I found them a little in the way. It is sheer. Considered buying, the more I wore it the more I loved it. Has enough structure to tuck in front but not back, or on one side only. Versatile to construct a look.
The sleeves were long on me but otherwise this top is so pretty. I paired it with a pair of jeans and booties. Just perfect!
Loved this top. It has really pretty lace like details. It is on the sheer snide. The sleeves were a little long on my but it wasn’t anything to stop me from wearing the top!

links_reviews_title: Just not ye right fit for me
links_reviews_text: Cute but just didn’t flow right on my body
Loved this item so much that after the first wear I needed to keep it.

I got this jacket despite all of the reviews complaining about how loud it was, and it's so cool! Unfortunately I didn't end up wearing it because the weather wasn't really in my favor. It's also pretty cropped and doesn't have pockets, which made it a little inconvenient. Overall, I loved the design and the eye—maybe I'll rent it again some other month to give it another try!
It fit well and is a really cool jacket, but the material is very noisy. I didn't have a chance to wear it out but it would be good for a concert or night out.

I had high expectations for this jacket- but I put it on and immediately regretted it. It's SO noisy. I couldn't move without the entire room knowing. Unfortunate because it's super cute and the eye detail is adorable but I just couldn't wear it because of how much noise it made.

Love the way this jacket looks on! Wore it with a frilly dress to contrast. However, I chose to wear to a concert because of how noisy it was when I moved around lol. It makes subtle squeaks that are kinda embarrassing unless you're in a noisy place. I even tried dusting it with powder to ease the squeak.
Such a cute jacket, but runs a little small and also SO NOISY!!

This jacket is really cute, but it’s super loud. Every little move the jacket makes loud crinkly noise. It also sticks to itself, although it’s not sticky to the touch. Then when it separates it makes a gross cheap pleather un-sticking noise. Very attractive. It’s cute enough that I’m going to wear it all the time, anyway, so I’ll just be the girl who sounds like a cheap car seat from the 80s for a month.
Got a ton of compliments when I wore this, however, the vinyl material is just really loud! Don't know if I could walk around in it forever, but fun to wear out.

links_reviews_title: Not quite what I thought it would be
links_reviews_text: This jacket is a really lovely color and well made. It was the perfect weight for our 40-50 F weather this past month, but unfortunately it has no closure mechanism other than the belt, so when I walked it would just slide open (the leather is slippery). I could only get it to stay shut (and thus actually keep me warm) by making the belt extremely tight.

I like the color and look of it. I wish it either had a button closure or a different belt to it, as wearing it with the belt did not flatter me, but then I had to wear it open which kept things a little drafty. Have been wearing it a fair amount, though!

This jacket is so cool and such an amazing color, especially for me. I pretty much only wear pastels and I Paired this with multiple pastel items of my own and it was great. I don’t think I walked into any room with out every person complimenting me on this coat. I did not wear it with the belt, it made me look a little bulky that way.

I wore this for Easter, even though we were quarantined at home. Super comfortable and adorable. Love the lilac color. I did get an XL to make sure it didn't gap (I'm 6 feet tall) and probably would have been fine with the large. Long enough so the dress hit me below the knees.
The dress looks way different in person

What a great dress! Really pretty color, fun print. I'm narrow-shouldered, and this is one of the few wrap dresses that has actually fit me correctly. I almost bought it, but it's a thicker synthetic material, so it's a bit warm for summer. I may rent it again in the fall.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but not for me
links_reviews_text: Really cute dress, fit and quality. I didn't ending up loving the purple color and evil eye pattern.

links_reviews_title: LOVE!!! Best wrap dress I have worn in a while!
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress - not only is the color and pattern beautiful, but the fit is to die for. I am pretty busty and I have a love-hate relationship with wrap dresses. This one hugged my curves in all the right places and I did not feel like my girls were constantly spilling out. The wrap up top made me feel secure and covered, while also showing off my best assets. Definitely a go to dress for spring time!
Loved the shape, LOVED the color. Got loads of compliments. Will rent again in summer, it's so fabulous.

Obsessed with everything about this dress -- the color (which I got complimented on EVERY time I wore it), the evil eye print, the wrap style...I could go on. The only thing I'd say is that, if you have a bigger bust, the cut is a bit low so you might want to wear a lacy bralette or cami underneath to keep things PG-13.
Nice dress. The color is great.

links_reviews_title: Be ready for lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous purple color, cute design, very flattering!!

I absolutely loved these and the fit was near perfect. Slightly loose on the waist but snug everywhere else. I’m 26” waist and 33 hip. 100 lbs. 24 was perfect. Debated on buying but I have a tiny closet.
Perfect length for this 5’4 mama
I really liked the dark blue color on these almost black. The front pockets were uniquely shaped. They had a good stretch but did not get too baggy at the end of the day.
Really like these. Great color, love the front pocket and raw hem detail, comfy jeans.
Fun dark jean- did not get to wear out wish I did. Will Rent again

links_reviews_title: They run large but a size up fits comfortably
links_reviews_text: Bought a size up (27) based on other reviews and glad I did as they fit well. They are stretchy, comfy and about a mid rise. I’ve worn them basically every day of quarantine so far.
These jeans are comfy and have a gorgeous dark wash! The fray at the bottom hem, and the angle of the front pockets are great details. Loved them - had to buy them!

These jeans are so comfy and fit great. Loved the subtle moto detailing that made them unique. I had trouble pairing the deep navy/almost black color with things in my closet. But loved them otherwise!
These were really cute almost like a modern moto jean type look, nice nayv blue color , not too distressed.
Best everyday jeans to dress up or down. Fits true to size and so comfy. Pockets in front add a fun detail. Wore them so many times during my rental that i just had to purchase!
I gravitated to these over my normal fave pairs of jeans that I actually own. They fit great, don’t stretch out and have just enough detail.

links_reviews_title: Loved so much I bought them
links_reviews_text: Great jeans!
I really liked these - they fit perfectly
No stretch to them and they were high rise now mid rise

links_reviews_title: For very tall and very thin women
links_reviews_text: These were some stylish jeans. The size was too small so I couldn't wear them. They're not for women with hips and a bubble butt. ;)

I absolutely loved these and the fit was near perfect. Slightly loose on the waist but snug everywhere else. I’m 26” waist and 33 hip. 100 lbs. 24 was perfect. Debated on buying but I have a tiny closet.
Perfect length for this 5’4 mama
I really liked the dark blue color on these almost black. The front pockets were uniquely shaped. They had a good stretch but did not get too baggy at the end of the day.
Really like these. Great color, love the front pocket and raw hem detail, comfy jeans.
Fun dark jean- did not get to wear out wish I did. Will Rent again

links_reviews_title: They run large but a size up fits comfortably
links_reviews_text: Bought a size up (27) based on other reviews and glad I did as they fit well. They are stretchy, comfy and about a mid rise. I’ve worn them basically every day of quarantine so far.
These jeans are comfy and have a gorgeous dark wash! The fray at the bottom hem, and the angle of the front pockets are great details. Loved them - had to buy them!

These jeans are so comfy and fit great. Loved the subtle moto detailing that made them unique. I had trouble pairing the deep navy/almost black color with things in my closet. But loved them otherwise!
These were really cute almost like a modern moto jean type look, nice nayv blue color , not too distressed.
Best everyday jeans to dress up or down. Fits true to size and so comfy. Pockets in front add a fun detail. Wore them so many times during my rental that i just had to purchase!
I gravitated to these over my normal fave pairs of jeans that I actually own. They fit great, don’t stretch out and have just enough detail.

links_reviews_title: Loved so much I bought them
links_reviews_text: Great jeans!
I really liked these - they fit perfectly
No stretch to them and they were high rise now mid rise

links_reviews_title: For very tall and very thin women
links_reviews_text: These were some stylish jeans. The size was too small so I couldn't wear them. They're not for women with hips and a bubble butt. ;)

links_reviews_title: Cute neon puffer, a bit boxy.
links_reviews_text: I love the look and color of this puffer, it's pretty warm so I didn't wear it all that much since it's gotten warmer in the past few weeks. I felt really cool wearing it, but it was quite oversized and boxy. I felt like the shoulders looked really stiff on me.

This is a super nice looking jacket—loved the bright color and contrasting black hardware. Unfortunately, it has literally no stretch to it so it didn’t zip up. I have a large bust and also currently pregnant so that doesn’t help even though I ordered the largest size. Despite those reasons, the shoulders and arms were way too tight to make this a comfy everyday jacket.

Once I got past the color difference from the photo which looks yellow, I actually really liked this. My usual size is roomy enough to have a sweatshirt underneath without looking oversized. I love the black zipper details. Seems warm although I haven't gone outside with it yet due to virus quarantine. I'm considering renting the lime green one next.

links_reviews_title: Cute neon puffer, a bit boxy.
links_reviews_text: I love the look and color of this puffer, it's pretty warm so I didn't wear it all that much since it's gotten warmer in the past few weeks. I felt really cool wearing it, but it was quite oversized and boxy. I felt like the shoulders looked really stiff on me.

This is a super nice looking jacket—loved the bright color and contrasting black hardware. Unfortunately, it has literally no stretch to it so it didn’t zip up. I have a large bust and also currently pregnant so that doesn’t help even though I ordered the largest size. Despite those reasons, the shoulders and arms were way too tight to make this a comfy everyday jacket.

Once I got past the color difference from the photo which looks yellow, I actually really liked this. My usual size is roomy enough to have a sweatshirt underneath without looking oversized. I love the black zipper details. Seems warm although I haven't gone outside with it yet due to virus quarantine. I'm considering renting the lime green one next.

This is the your perfect hang out shirt, beach shirt, cleaning my House shirt... it’s the shirt you literally put on and never want to take off because you can do anything in this! Loved this item so much I bought it! (My first Nuuly purchase :D ) I liked how it was an oversized fit and super comfortable.

I have had my eye on this item on the free people website but could not muster up the courage to buy it with its hefty price tag . This dress does not disappoint so original so different all around absolutely amazing !!! I legit renewed my Nuuly to get try this dress and i am so glad i did , i did size down im usually a size med and went with a small . RENT THIS

Absolutely loved this dress!! Super comfy and flattering, even for being 8 months prehnant! Lightweight but not see through- perfect amount of fabric, with such a beautiful, unique, cottage like style! Would of bought, But I couldn’t at this point...

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear and very comfortable
links_reviews_text: Fashionable rag doll vibes - Feedback from one appearance this dress made on Zoom.

links_reviews_title: LET ME LIVE IN THIS PIECE
links_reviews_text: OMG. I love this dress. When I added it to my nuuly I didn't realize how obsessed with it I would be, but dang I did not want to send her back. The colors, the patterns, the mix matched nature. Ugh, I am obsessed. It was so easy to wear and easily dressed up or down. You could definitely belt it for a more put together look, or throw a big knit over the top for a warm + cozy look. Definitely will be re renting in the future.
I loved this dress. So classic free people

I had the highest hopes for this dress, but was so disappointed that it barely buttoned over my chest. It was absurdly tiny. While I love the idea of a form fitting denim dress, this missed the mark. Also pretty short.

I wish I got this dress in the correct size or else I’d buy it! It’s so pretty on. I rented the 8 and it fits more loose if you like that. But with this style a 6 would’ve hugged my body in all the right places and make it more flattering. It has some stretch up top and the length is perfect for my height to wear flats if you want.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but didn't like it on
links_reviews_text: It's a cute dress and wasn't too long even though I am short, but the shoulders are puffy and it almost makes you look like you are wearing shoulder pads. Felt too formal for every day wear.

links_reviews_title: True to size—errs too renaissance faire for me
links_reviews_text: I am all about a puff sleeved floral dress but this one doesn't have a waist and has an odd rounding hemline. It's also a full maxi making it feel less hip and more dumpy. It was all together too renaissance faire not for me.

Such a cute dress! Very boho/flowery and runs a little large as most FP stuff does. I was able to slip the dress right over my head - didn't even realize there was a zipper at the rib cage. Not see-through (it's lined) and overall a happy thing to wear.
Fit beautifully! Loved everything about this dress. Very flattering.
My favorite thing in my Nuuly this month! Fits true to size and super flattering!

I wish I got this dress in the correct size or else I’d buy it! It’s so pretty on. I rented the 8 and it fits more loose if you like that. But with this style a 6 would’ve hugged my body in all the right places and make it more flattering. It has some stretch up top and the length is perfect for my height to wear flats if you want.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but didn't like it on
links_reviews_text: It's a cute dress and wasn't too long even though I am short, but the shoulders are puffy and it almost makes you look like you are wearing shoulder pads. Felt too formal for every day wear.

links_reviews_title: True to size—errs too renaissance faire for me
links_reviews_text: I am all about a puff sleeved floral dress but this one doesn't have a waist and has an odd rounding hemline. It's also a full maxi making it feel less hip and more dumpy. It was all together too renaissance faire not for me.

Such a cute dress! Very boho/flowery and runs a little large as most FP stuff does. I was able to slip the dress right over my head - didn't even realize there was a zipper at the rib cage. Not see-through (it's lined) and overall a happy thing to wear.
Fit beautifully! Loved everything about this dress. Very flattering.
My favorite thing in my Nuuly this month! Fits true to size and super flattering!
This dress is precious! True to size and made me feel pretty while very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Super fun without being too renaissance faire—size up for boobs
links_reviews_text: Very flatting and trendy dress. The print/colors are not my fav so I didn't keep it. I sized up to make sure my boobs fit. The top fits tight to your toros, and you button and zip into it so I would def go up if you have broad shoulders, a wide torso, or big boobs. It has some boning so I wore it without a bra, which I literally never do—so that was nice.

Wanted to hop on the puffy sleeve train but these ones are TOO PUFFY. The fabric makes the poof very stiff and inelegant. Maybe will work for something with a larger chest to balance the top half out?
Tried it on, boxy fit. This is one that I think would be better worn in a bit. Arm length is short. I liked it better open with a tee underneath.

Glad I was able to try this top out without purchasing with the high price point. Loved the color and quality. The middle section is a more structured thicker fabric that could make you look a little boxy. I think sizing down would be best.
Great color! Fit well

well the color is vibrant, the material felt a little stiffer than I imagined. the length was a little weird on me, I'd like it a little shorter or longer - the way it was felt somewhat boxy. I sent it back but wore it while I had it.
Beautiful top, extremely well made down to every detail and the color is amazing. The only issue I had was it ran a little large and so looked bulky on me, may want to size down.
I wanted to like it, but the overall design... Well... I just felt silly in it. Way cuter in the model photo.

links_reviews_title: Loved this top! Looks so good on.
links_reviews_text: I wore with jeans and white jeans! Could be casual or dressed up!! Do not want to send back

Love this so much...I wish I could buy it! Amazingly nice fabric and flattering, oversized fit. I wore this while social distancing at home, but everyone who saw it on Zoom agreed that it looked great!
Better in person. Gorgeous construction. Fits tent-ish so a L felt more like XL/XXL.

links_reviews_title: beautiful detailing, stiff fabric, boxy fit
links_reviews_text: - exaggerated, boxy fit - easy to wear and throw on - a substantial, stiffer fabric - gorgeous detailing

links_reviews_title: True to size, thicker then expected
links_reviews_text: -boxy fit overall -fabric is a bit ridge and stiff - really well made -would look cute with shots
True to size, gaping at the waist a bit, rigid denim, pinkish/purple tint to the denim
True to size, fits larger in the waist, side zip, vintage-style denim
A great spring top with a beautiful print
I really loved this top, I’m not particularly tall so it felt more like a short dress on me. I wore it with wine coloured velvet leggings which looked super cute. I might have to keep this one.

links_reviews_title: Boho sheer top *almost* a baby doll!
links_reviews_text: Liked the sheer fabric and print. Fit was good in chest, arms. Please note it is definitely boho flowy in waist, quite long, so skinny jean styling recommended. I was 6 months pregnant, wore with tank so did *not* unbutton like model - would be sexy way to wear otherwise :).

links_reviews_title: Very flattering and long enough to wear with leggings
links_reviews_text: What a beautiful tunic to add to my wardrobe!
Loved the pattern of the fabric but not necessarily the fit. By itself it was not very flattering. After I added a duster sweater it helped a great deal.
This was the perfect dressed up white top. Loved that you could throw it on with a pear of jeans or shorts and immediately look polished and put together.
nice weight and comfortable fabric but the sleeves were a bit too big
what a beautiful top with a great fit. Comfortable and sassy
Nothing special
This sweater fits oversized. The colors are beautiful and it's really soft.
I wore it frequently. I loved the colors. The knit was loose so needed to wear a cami under it. Also needed to be careful with bracelets because it could easily snag. Loved the feel and fit.

This was a fun, colorful sweater... the knit was perfect in the spring where it's cool in the morning and warmer later on. The fit was good, however I felt it was a little more boxy than I like, but that's just a personal preference.
Colors were pretty. And it came new with tags. Just wasn’t a favorite for me.
Too big for me
And comfy! Loved this sweater. No need to size up for the baggy look

This sweater was not what I wanted it to be. I went up a size hoping it would be a little baggy. It just kinda hung funny and the band at the waist was tight and not super cute. I do like the colors. Wish I loved it more.
This was cute to wear around the house and run errands in. Perfect for quarantine :)
Great spring sweater in warmer weather, bright happy colors
I loved this sweater and I bought it! I think it runs a bit large, it's baggy on me but it's so cute. Not super warm, but beach vibes for sure

I absolutely love this sweater. The colors are just a vibrant and gorgeous in person, and I adore the material it’s made of - it doesn’t feel thick or bulky at all. It feels super flowy, comfortable, and lightweight. This definitely wouldn’t be the piece to go for if you’re looking for a super warm sweater, but it would be a great item to wear during a chilly evening or during the spring. This ended up being my favorite piece that I got in my Nuuly for the month, and I’m very tempted to buy. I would definitely recommend sizing down - I typically go for a women’s large because I prefer a looser fit, and I’m so glad I went with a medium for this piece! Even the medium felt a bit loose, and I think a small may have fit me better, but I didn’t mind the loose, flowy fit.

links_reviews_title: Pretty and unique, just a little bulky.
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to love this more, but it added a weird bulk to my shoulders and so it didn’t suit me well. It’s really pretty and I love the look of it with jeans so I might try it again in a smaller size. Very well made!
It's like a little fancier denim jacket! Wore it over a dress and with jeans, loved the fit, fabric and style.

links_reviews_title: Thought I would love it more
links_reviews_text: I was super excited about this piece when I ordered. The color is kind of bland in person. It is lined all the way around. Good to throw on, but made me look bulkier because of the embroidered part.
I love the print and cut of this, but it fit me too baggy in the waist and was a bit short for my taste.

This was a great dress for looking polished on Zoom and while still feeling like I was in PJs. High quality, thick fabric and nice embroidery. That said, I could definitely have gone down a size - quite large in the waist, and very generous in the bust, even as a DD -- excepting the fact that this really puts the "mini" in mini dress. If you're an hourglass shape I'd caution you if you don't like super short dresses. Definitely not as long as it appears on the fit model.
Cute but not my style
Beautiful, high-quality dressThis dress around with the tags still on it it was absolutely gorgeous and it is made of a very thick material very high-quality and well constructed
It was just ok... nothing special...

I actually got sent a brand new with tags on one, and I am totally in love! If i wasn't already keeping one thing from this batch I would likely keep this. I don't like short dresses, but this was just right for my modest self, but felt a little flirty. I'm only 5'1" and the sleeves didn't overwhelm me which I was grateful for and the pull on styling made it super comfy
Runs a bit short for work but every comfortable and stylish
Great shade of blue, looked expensive my cats really liked it #quarantinelyfe
I’m so tempted to keep this! It’s a gorgeous color, perfect fit and it keeps you dry!
Loved it!!! Super soft jersey fabric lining and it fit my growing belly at 24 weeks pregnant zipped up. Color was great!

links_reviews_title: Great color and inside pattern, poor fit.
links_reviews_text: I so wanted to love this rain coat the color is pretty, and the sleeves look cute rolled up once to show the striped pattern on the inside, however it is shapeless and runs really large. It felt more like it was cut for a man.

Fun burnt orange color. Fully lined in a striped jersey knit. Great for spring. Nice sized hood. Adjustable wrist size. The only thing that would make this better is double zippers, to make it more city-commuter friendly and inside pockets, for the same reason. I have a raincoat I've been hoping to replace and this might be it. Love that it's longer so hits mid-thigh.
Awesome simple rain coat - great color and comfy lining.

This Jacket runs true to size, its a bit long, I'm 5'4 so if your short it may not be for you unless you like it long. It hit me below the knee. Its warm and cozy and the lining is super cute, its a pin stripe. I wore it several times since I live in a rainy area.
Everything about this raincoat was spot on. The color, fit, interior, like everything. It not only was stylish but worked to keep me dry and warm

I've purchased a couple of raincoats in the last couple of years, but nothing as cute as this one! I loved the color and design of this raincoat, and have worn it daily since I got it. I am usually wary of fashion items that claim utility, but this raincoat is actually waterproof and much more comfortable than I expected it to be. I wound up purchasing and can't wait to wear it for years to come!
Love this jacket. It’s lined with a cotton fabric so it’s actually really warm and substantive. Was almost too heavy for March/ April weather.
The quality of the piece is amazing! Since it was a new style, it came with tags so it was brand new! I only wish it was warm enough to wear it more often. Great for a short hike in the PNW too.

Loved the burnt orange color! Quality was quite good and the snaps for the wrists made the fit for the sleeves really nice so didn't ride up or cover hands. Was really close to purchasing this but for the price tag I would want something that would also work well for bike commuting.

Loved this rain jacket because it kept me dry, what a perfect pick for a spring closet! The jersey knit liner prevented that humid feeling and was striped so it looked cute. My only dislike was the color, it’s a weird shade of burnt orange/red/brown depending on the lighting.
Soft warm insides. I love the color! I contemplated buying but live in Texas so wouldn’t use it the rest of the season till November or December unfortunately

Great quality. Cotton interior keeps you comfy and warm. Outer pockets will keep whatever is in there dry. The hood is a good size - even for someone with glasses. If you want it to fit you snugly, go down a size.
Really great jacket, fits perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Saw it, liked it, bought it!
links_reviews_text: Loved this jacket! Looks cute with jeans and a tee, but also athletic gear. It’s kind of a baggy bomber style jacket that is perfect for layering in the spring. I liked this so much I bought it!

This is a perfect Spring jacket. It runs full but I liked the fit in a medium. The fabric was light weight but with a bit of weight to it. I received it new with tags, a first for me and Nuuly! I'm considering buying this one.

I was given this item as a replacement to something else I ordered that was out of stock. Initially I was a little bummed, but I ended up really liking this jacket. If I could, I would have sized down to a SM vs MD, but it has a cropped/oversized look so I was still able to pull it off. I likeee!
Got so many compliments on the jacket! Everyone told me to buy it but its not really my style! Definitely recommend if your into puffers or oversized jackets. Super light weight and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Saw it, liked it, bought it!
links_reviews_text: Loved this jacket! Looks cute with jeans and a tee, but also athletic gear. It’s kind of a baggy bomber style jacket that is perfect for layering in the spring. I liked this so much I bought it!

This is a perfect Spring jacket. It runs full but I liked the fit in a medium. The fabric was light weight but with a bit of weight to it. I received it new with tags, a first for me and Nuuly! I'm considering buying this one.

I was given this item as a replacement to something else I ordered that was out of stock. Initially I was a little bummed, but I ended up really liking this jacket. If I could, I would have sized down to a SM vs MD, but it has a cropped/oversized look so I was still able to pull it off. I likeee!
Got so many compliments on the jacket! Everyone told me to buy it but its not really my style! Definitely recommend if your into puffers or oversized jackets. Super light weight and comfortable.
Fit beautifully. Received lots of compliments. It’s completely see through so wore a tank underneath.
Very pretty blouse but rather stiff, scratchy fabric. It's very short and hit me in a weird spot. Not flattering.

This blouse is beautiful. I never wore it just because we’re all in lock down but the proportions looked a little off to me (body and short compared to the lovely, full sleeves). I gave it 4 starts because it’s adorable, I’m just not sure about the fit.

links_reviews_title: True to Size, Chic with Jeans
links_reviews_text: collared neckline, easy sleeves, slightly oversized through the body, hip length, lightweight, slightly stiff fabric
Very boxy and oversized yet cropped. Super cute and I'm sure others can find a way to rock this it just wasn't for me. I would definitely size down, the arms are pretty big!

I was really excited to get this jacket. I had ordered a large not knowing what the fit was as no one had reviewed it yet. The jacket is oversized, which I hadn't realized - size down. Also, it's very cropped. Overall I loved the jacket, just ordered the wrong size so I couldn't wear it often enough. The material is really nice and lightweight.

Beautiful and so lovely but I did find it hard to style multiple ways since it doesn’t have any closures aside from the tie at the bust. I think it would be more versatile if it could be worn on its own as a dress and also a duster/kimono type frock as well.
Loved how comfy this was! Sleeves were a little long but still a great piece and super verstaile.
Love it, flattering and great earth tones.
- easy, relaxed fit - gauze-like fabric - if you have blonde hair, color may wash you out
-very soft and flowy -runs really long -could be worn with anything
I love this blouse so much!

These jeans are so soft and comfy! I just wish I had ordered them in a 28 instead. They come right up to my belly button so I wore them with a bunch of blousy free people tops tucked in. Size down if you’re in between sizes
True to size, soooo comfortable, a little gapping in the back, cropped length, high rise
True to size, so soft and comfortable, a ton of stretch, feels like a legging with the look of a jean, cute extra detail at the bottom!
Loved these!

A pair of white jeans is a spring essential ✨ I love these so much! Sadly, me and Levis don’t get along usually so I ordered a size up and I need me regular size 25 in these bad boys! So I’m gonna rent again and buy them!!

I was excited for these after renting/owning a few other pairs of Levi's Wedgie jeans that I loved, but these really disappointed me and I never wore them. Note: these jeans are sold in 2 lengths (26 and 28) and these are the 26 (or at least, that I what I received). I'm 5'5/5'6 and they are so short on me, way beyond an ankle/crop. I keep putting them back on to see if I can make it work, but they're so unflattering/goofy looking I always end up changing.

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for quarantine + beyond!
links_reviews_text: This is the perfect at home dress. It’s comfortable, nursing friendly + chic. I wore this while working, cooking, sitting on the floor, out for walks + on Mother’a Day. I’m petite so it fit me as a maxi and the neckline was definitely lower on me than on the model. The fabric is really light and flowy. I’ll probably rent it again this summer!

links_reviews_title: Lightweight... the perfect summer quarantine pool dress
links_reviews_text: I won't lie, this became my favorite thing to lounge around the house in during quarantine. It's comfy. It makes you feel really pretty, it's lightweight and breathable. I can imagine being on vacation in this dress
Comfortable and fit well but I felt like I was wearing a nighty.

This dress is flowy goodness - so comfortable for lounging around in the house while feeling like a queen. It is sheer so I wouldn’t wear it outside except maybe as a beach coverup or with a slip. My husband did ask if I was wearing a robe while wearing this 😂 runs big, I had to wear my most padded bra to feel more shapely.
So cute, fits well, looks WAY more put together than just throwing it on in the morning. Wish it came with a slip, but I used my own and it was fine!

i usually wear a medium and got a small and it was still too boxy: i couldn't get the under-bust cinch tight enough. it didn't look cute, but i wore it around the house as a nightgown a few times. #quarantine
So beautiful. Light weight but still drapey. Bought it for summer!
I loved this dress but the color and style did not suit me.
The closures at the chest wouldn't stay closed. It is very thin, so you would need to wear a slip.
Would have kept if it didn't require a slip. Really uped my style game during the quarantine dog walks.
Causal and pretty, I loved the color.
Loved! Fit true to size for me. I have hips and a bust. I would have kept, but UPS damaged it.
This was comfortable and pretty.

I’m in my second trimester of pregnancy and ordered one size up from my usual FP size, and it fit perfect. Loved it so much I wore it a couple times around the house even though we are on quarantine. I would definitely have kept it if it was under $100.

links_reviews_title: Cute if you have a significant chest
links_reviews_text: The empire waist is a drawstring so there is quite a bit of wiggle room in the sizing, however the chest is huge. It is designed to show some cleavage and really will only work if you have an ample bust.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful jumpsuit, dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Love this jumper! I got in a size up so my big booty friend and my big booby self could share it on vacay which was canceled so I danced around home in it instead. Really nice material, could be fancy with heels or caj with flats. Love the look and material and will def rent again when I'm allowed outside
Could not wear because it did not fit me

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Lightweight, so perfect with shorts or jeans, depending on the season. It felt chicer than most of my slouchy sweatshirts but just as cozy, so I bought it!

links_reviews_title: Cute and Breezy - a little short in the body
links_reviews_text: This was my favorite from the box. It was warm despite being knitted with larger holes. Overall it was a good spring shirt for Chicago - could have been a bit longer

This is a cute sweater for casual summer days. Cute worn as a coverup or after a day on the sun. The sweater is a bit see through. It was smaller than I thought it would be. I ordered a size up and sleeves were still short. I wanted it to be more oversized. Overall, it was cute!
They are very soft and comfortable and they fit true to size. I think they just looked weird on the butt hamstring area but I realized I am just not a fan of pleated pants on me!

They are really comfy jeans wow. The look however was a little bit of a muffin top for me. And I’m not a gigantic gal. If you really want to mom out with your jeans and be really comfortable go with these!
Loved the length- usually would wear 29 in Paige but ordered a 30 based on other reviews. Fit but still a little tight in the waist, especially when tucking in your shirt. Loved the color and length!

I wanted to wear these every day! They are so soft, stylish, and versatile. I would possibly size down if I try them again. The only reason I'm not buying them is because there is an economic downturn and I can't pay $100+ for jeans. But definitely putting them on my wish list!

Loved the concept of these pants and knew that they would be a risk for my body type... I'm a tall pear shaped person and these were just tight in all the wrong places. The waist was a little snug (maybe its that quarantine 15 :) but the pleats were very unflattering and didn't lay flat on me. Even if I had sized up, I think these would have putched and flared out around my middle, which doesn't look good on pear shaped folks.
Loved the fit of these jeans. Easy to pair with a sweatshirt or tee around the house or out and about. Would definitely get these again!
I love this pants! They are perfect. The fit! The weight of the pant! The length!

I got these during quarantine but loved the fit so I forced my husband to get dressed up with me for a dinner at home so I would wear them. I’m always hesitant to rent jeans because I’m 5’1” with hips, but these fit perfect in a 26.

links_reviews_title: Liked the concept but didn't work for me
links_reviews_text: I was excited for these but they are too frumpy. If I went with a size small I might have liked them better. Color is nice but just looked too oversized.
Fabric is satiny. Great for a spring event, very pastel. Comfy.
Great material. Great fit. Just have nowhere to wear them too because of the lock down! Would def order again
True to size, high waisted, elastic waistband with pleating, oversized pockets, mini length

links_reviews_title: Weird fit, but SO soft and comfy
links_reviews_text: -silky, lightweight and soft - roomy top, no modesty closure, true wrap - very boho, great day dress, but could be dressed up for evening "will look great on anyone"

links_reviews_title: slouchy top, very deep and revealing v-neck
links_reviews_text: - easy fit, generous and revealing in the bust, but would wear without a bra - true wrap silhouette - silky fabric - wear to a winery / 'feels like water on a hot day'
This skirt ran small on me. The waist was tight and the skirt puffed out around my hips. I do like the print so I may rent another size.

I absolutely love this dress! It is beautiful and fit perfectly! You can dress it up or dress it down so I feel that it is pretty versatile although I am prone to wearing dresses! I definitely will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great potential but not very fitting
links_reviews_text: This is a really pretty dress but it doesn’t do much for your waist (i think that is why the girl is holding her waist in the model photos!) I’m usually between a size 2 and 4 so I ordered a size 2.

links_reviews_title: fits well, but hip seam constricting
links_reviews_text: - true maxi - odd placement of hip seam, a bit constricting - heavier fabric, woven, but almost feels like a knit - would wear in the evening or indoors because of the fabric

links_reviews_title: Love the fit, not a fan of the seam at hip
links_reviews_text: -true, full-length maxi -looks dresser then it feels -thicker, but not stiff fabric -off the shoulder stays in place "This is a really fun dress, I love this!"
It was just okay. Nothing super special. The black belt helps jazz it up a little.
This dress is amazing!!!!! Looks beautiful with a high bun and an all over bronzer!!!!!
-runs very large -very flowy, but very sheer needs to be worn with a slip -looks really cute belted -fully unbuttons so could be worn like a duster

links_reviews_title: runs large and very, very sheer
links_reviews_text: - overall roomy fit, sheer enough to require specific undergarments - tent-like design - surprisingly heavy fabric - would wear as a fabulous beach cover-up
Soft, sturdy, and warm. This is, obviously, a rather strange sweatshirt. But, if you are the sort of person who enjoys a giant cat head on their sweatshirt, which I am, this is a great find!

links_reviews_title: How can you not smile with this on?
links_reviews_text: This Brian Tie Dye Kitty Sweatshirt added fun to my WFH outfits with its colorful tie dye and amazing cat image! The crop worked great with jeans, leggings, a high-waisted skirty, and even over a jumpsuit! It fit true to size and was the perfect amount of cozy to wear in cool or warm weather - perfect for this "Spring" time of year. A ZOOM meeting crowd favorite as well.

Very warm sweatshirt. Love the tie-dye. The cat face provided some interesting talking points for an online work meeting. If the weather hadn't changed abruptly from winter to summer, I would've worn this more.

I wanted to love this so much, as I'm a cat person and a sweatshirt girl - what could be better? But this was a bit of a disappointment. The colors were much more muted in person than the photo showed, almost a faded look, and it was definitely more cropped than the picture made it appear. I wanted a sweatshirt, not a crop top; this barely covered the waistband of my jeans and I am very short-waisted. The kitty was cute, but altogether this just was a miss for me.

links_reviews_title: Who doesn't love cats and tie dye?
links_reviews_text: Had so much fun with this sweatshirt! I got it because it was joyful and creative, which is what everyone needs a little more of. I kept it because it actually fit really well and was super comfy--its a bit cropped, fits well along the waist, and the material is sturdy, yety cozy.
This was fun! Not as nice as I would've expected based on it's retail price, but it was still fun to throw on for a pop of color and weirdness.
Feel cute even if you’re stuck at home. Cute comfy cropped sweater!
Now I own

I couldn't return this because it's become my go-to for working from home. The colors are great and it's very soft and comfortable -- good quality. My boyfriend even likes it on me. It's purrrrfect for any cat or tie dye lovers. Go ahead and rent it!
When I ordered this Nuuly box, I didn't know I would be spending a month at home, but this became my favorite item to wear around the house. It's loud, it's weird, and it's also a comfy sweatshirt.
Fun but also fits well.
I love this sweatshirt- it's comfy but still put-together-looking; cute cut (cropped), and the hypercolor pattern and cat graphic are adorable. I'm debating hanging onto this one :-)
So cute, cropped, comfy, and it just happened to be new. I would buy it if it wasn't so expensive.

links_reviews_title: Fit true to size, really cozy
links_reviews_text: -really great fit and color -hit at waist -really soft
A super cozy, fun sweatshirt. Fits true to size.
I didn't have a chance to wear this out because 1. It's quarantine time and 2. My boyfriend reeeeeally liked it. Great quality and shape. Sexy but work-appropriate. It hugs them curves!
Fits like a glove, Knee length, Faux wrap, lost of stretch, a bit heavier weight jersey knit.
True to size, faux wrap silhouette, fits like a glove, knee-length, classic, substantial jersey fabric, great for dinner
Loved this skirt so much that I went over to Free People to buy a brand new one!
I didn’t end up wearing as the fit wasn’t quite right for me. But can see how it’s a good throw on skirt for casual vibes
wore a few times the fit does run a little large so I am happy that I read the reviews and opted for an xs. it was perfect for me
Runs big. Felt a little bulky and too hot
i liked the texture of the material, I'm normally a Medium in bottoms and would never been able to walk out with the medium it was so loose. downsize!
I received tons of compliments on this skirt, but I wear a (solid) medium, ordered a small and it was still quite large and stretched out throughout the day. Size down!
Love this! The slit is so cute. I’m size 28 in jeans and ordered a small. Could have definitely used an XS.

The XS was almost a little too big because the inside surplice buttons to the side seam. Luckily the other side is the tie so I was able to tie it tightly. If I got a small, this would have been too big. Needed to wear this with a cami since there is no snap at the bust line. Overall a super cute top!

"It looks like you're wearing a really sexy tablecloth. In a good way." - BF I'm on the fence about purchasing this top for keeps. The fabric is PERFECT -- it's light, delicately patterned, and not-too-sheer. The fit is 75% there -- The tie-waist is flattering. However, the neckline is looooow AF. It's light enough to wear a cami under, but the sleeves. The sleeves are SUPER POOF. I tried rolling them up, but the wrist is unusually tight, and could only get in 2 turns. It's definitely a fun summer top, but being busty, I don't need a ton of extra upper-body volume and would consider keeping only with a trip too the tailor to trim those pirate poofs down.
I was swimming in this top. It's extremely loose, in all aspects. Even when I tie the side as tight as I can, it's still very roomy. Bummer, it looked great on the model.
Very cute comfortable top, gives that festival vibe.

links_reviews_title: Wore it a lot but can't decide how much I actually like it
links_reviews_text: This is a great lightweight top with a really cool design. It's a little sheer, but not bad especially if you're working from home and not moving around very much! I wore it with pants or longer shorts because if you don't you look exactly like the model and look like you're not wearing anything underneath. But hey if you're working from home then that doesn't even matter! Lastly, it's suuper flowy, which is fun and comfortable, but not actually that flattering. While I enjoyed wearing it I also couldn't decide if I looked like I was wearing a maternity shirt. That being said, pregnant peeps might love this top for all the extra room.

I was definitely looking for something flowy and loose, but this was HUGE. I wish I had ordered 2 sizes down for the fit I was going for, but also, looking back at the photo, if she had it buttoned up and how it actually looks, I probably would have made that choice myself. Oh well, butter luck next time!
Love the color + the poofy sleeves were fun. The back was my favorite part!

If I was going to a garden party this is what I would wear. Instead wore to a virtual fundraiser. Tempted to buy it. The sleeves are fun. Dress is comfy. Double-lined so easy to go braless, which you need to do given the open back.
Oh my gosh I love this dress so much. I was worried about the puffiness of the sleeves but they're actually really cute. They look good worn off the shoulder as well. The colors are stunning!

links_reviews_title: I think I want to buy it!
links_reviews_text: I really didn't expect to love this dress as much as I did, but I'm thinking of buying it. Huge, poufy shoulders and shows off my back tattoo!
Such a pretty print. But shoulders ran super wide. Back was quite bare as well. Runs big across the shoulders.

I got a bunch of dresses so that I could wear one to a semi-formal wedding. This dress was NOT the winner. I am not sure who this would look good on, but it certainly didn’t work for me. It looked like an 80’s prom dress made out of 70’s fabric. The waist was also loose, which is saying a lot since I am a new mom still loosing her baby belly. Woah Nelly! On a positive note, the fabric was nice quality and the colors were beautiful. * I suspect that a tall person with a straight figure might have better luck, but not being either of those things, I can’t prove it.
- overall fits well, this would be more of a maxi on a petite - shoulders can be worn up or down - light and airy fabric - appropriate for day and night with the right accessories
-fits, but sleeves have a lot of volume -fits well in the waits, but sits lower -can be dressed up or down -lightweight "I'm having fun in this!"
So cute, so cozy. The perfect everyday shirt. Wish I had sized down to an xs.
It's a just a perfect t-shirt
I wore this on earth day and I liked it a lot. It's oversized and cute with denim shorts.
Comfy, cute, true to size! Definitely recommend.
Adorable t-shirt. One note it's not purely white- has a cream/egg color. but color didn't bother me
Just loved it- great graphic tee
This was such an easy tee to wear with jeans or athletic pants. Casual, but fun. And SUPER soft.
Ran a little big, I will purchase the next size down.

links_reviews_title: Cute little t-shirt that came with tags on. I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Simple and with a nice message. : )
Loved the shirt . Cute print and good quality

Oh goodness how I wanted to love this! I'm not sure if the quarantine-15 have completely focused on my thighs, but there was no way I could wear this for more than just a try-on session. I'm fairly petite (5'1) and normally a XSP so I really didn't expect this to be so tight. It also ran a lot shorter than on the model. I ordered a Petite so expected it to hit right above the ankle (like pictured), but this was about mid-calf. Definitely size up, and shorties may want to skip the petite on this one!
I'm 5'5" and the length of this was a little too long. The waistband did not hit in the right spot so it looked bunched up so I didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: I don't know whose body this is made for
links_reviews_text: I rented this hoping it would be something comfy to wear during quarantine and it is definitely not comfy in any way. If you have teeny tiny thighs and a very thin neck, this will probably look great on you! If you have average thigh and neck proportions, do not rent this! I should have listened to other reviewers. The thighs are so tight, and if I lean forward in this jumpsuit at all, the neck strap chokes me. It's just not comfortable at all.
The crotch on this jumpsuit is impossibly long, even on the petite side. It's also awkwardly tight in the thigh area but loose everywhere else? Don't do it. I wish I didn't waste an item on this.
It the crotch was way too saggy
I'm not exactly sure what and where it fit wrong, but the cut was way off for my figure. Bummer.
So did it fit, yes. Was it true to size, technically yes. But it just fit awkwardly... Found the mid section to be a bit droopy and the crop of the paints to hit at a weird spot on my legs.

I plan to live in this outfit this summer. I love the harem pants, the color combination and the ability to tie the straps to whatever size I need. It is sheer - you will probably want to wear a nude body suit of some sort underneath or just listen to your daughter complain about how she can see through it, like I do.

I agree with the other reviews - This is really baggy and sheer, but it's cute for wearing around the house and makes a good cover up for the beach or pool. I tried belting it, but liked it better baggy. I tied the straps around the back of my neck halter style like my bathing suit top which worked well.

i got this to wear during quarantine and i had a lot of fun wearing it. I didn't anticipate it being so sheer but since i was wearing it at home it didn't really matter. it was a tad long but i am on the shorter side so an XS might've been better.

links_reviews_title: It you’ve got skin toned undergarments, go for it
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is so fun but SO sheer! You can make out your entire silhouette underneath. If you have skin toned undergarments I would definitely give it a try. Or if you need something to wear in super hot weather or just want to feel like a genie.
Love wearing it around the house or as a bathing suit cover up. It is too sheer to be worn for anything else though.

Love it so much more than I thought I would. Easy to throw on & feel set for the day. Like most jumpsuits, using the restroom was a concern- but ended up being fairly simple, slip of the shoulders and you're set. I know I am going to wear this all the month long. Can be slightly sheer, so be prepared for that. It's meant to be very oversized in the body but fit the bust area. I'm usually a 14 & the large fit me, so I would say true to FP sizing.
This is huge, and very long. I'm 5'10" and it was too long on me. It's comfy and cute, and definitely see-through so it's good for social distancing or for a beach vacay.

links_reviews_title: More of a beach cover up
links_reviews_text: I was excited to wear this to the office but it was too shear. A tad bit oversized in the waist.
I love this dress. It fit in all the right places and was the perfect length on me. I can’t wait to wear it all summer long!
Instant cuteness in one dress! Flattering and effortless. True to size perfection.
Cute
This dress is super cute but the quality is not good. Its made of a super thin, unlined fabric. I ordered a medium and it fits but is still teeny tiny.

I was in love with this dress. I initially bought it for a trip to Australia but wore it for a quarantine zoom party instead. Got lots of compliments on it and my husband loved it! The purple was super flattering with my dark hair. It’s very comfy and fun to twirl around in. The perfect pop of color for a spring or summer dress. Was sad to give it back.

Love the colors, thin and light fabric, perfect for the beach. I thought the shoulder/sleeve situation would be weird, but I ended up liking it. super flattering and comfortable and got lots of compliments
this should be called a tunic, not a dress. it is far too short.
True to size, beautiful neckline, ruching on the arms stays put and does not ride up, skimpy cut, lightweight for days by the beach
True to size, unlined, super lightweight, could be tunic over jeans, perfect for the beach/pool

links_reviews_title: Great as a cardigan or alone
links_reviews_text: I sized up because the reviews said it was fitted and I wanted a comfortable work from home feel. I could have gone with my usual size Medium and it would have worked just as well. Lighter weight sweater perfect for Spring or colder seasons
I loved how this felt like a sweatshirt but was more refined. Very comfortable and easy to layer

This became my most favorite sweater immediately. Soft, cozy, felt like wearing a favorite sweatshirt, but so much more stylish. The colors, weight and style would be good in any season but summer. I wore it a LOT and found it went with quite a few things I already own. I am considering buying it.

links_reviews_title: Fits great, So soft and cozy
links_reviews_text: -fit as expected, great for layering and loose -really soft and warm -nice to wear for the weekend and as lounge

links_reviews_title: true to size, easy to throw on
links_reviews_text: - fitted and flattering look - super soft and easy to wear - would wear for casual weekends

links_reviews_title: Did not hang evenly on the body
links_reviews_text: I wanted it to work! But I couldn't get the dress to sit evenly, it was always so much shorter in the back. Material was nice for the summer, thin but thats what I like and the color was interesting but flattering.

This dress is pretty on. Very flirty and flattering. I thought it was an appropriate length on me (5' 8") and the straps are adjustable which is a major plus. Not sure how easily I could wear a bra with it, but I am looking forward to putting this with some sneakers or casual shoes and a denim jacket.
the cowl neck opening was extremely unflattering and uncontrollable. there's no way I could wear this in public.

links_reviews_title: Did not hang evenly on the body
links_reviews_text: I wanted it to work! But I couldn't get the dress to sit evenly, it was always so much shorter in the back. Material was nice for the summer, thin but thats what I like and the color was interesting but flattering.

This dress is pretty on. Very flirty and flattering. I thought it was an appropriate length on me (5' 8") and the straps are adjustable which is a major plus. Not sure how easily I could wear a bra with it, but I am looking forward to putting this with some sneakers or casual shoes and a denim jacket.
the cowl neck opening was extremely unflattering and uncontrollable. there's no way I could wear this in public.

Well, I like this in theory and on someone else it just might work. But on me, it looks like the “pirate shirt” from Seinfeld. I’m too big-boned for the flowy design. I have big shoulders, and the puffy sleeves made them look even bigger. Not for me but on someone petite, it could be lovely.
If you're petite this dress is a great length. Love the look.. hard to find a bra to go with it but super cute.
It was cute and comfortable with thick enough fabric to go bra less but from the front I felt my chest was a little flattened and I seemed boxy. The back was so cute though

Loved this piece. I ended up wearing it to work with mules and it was comfy and cute. My only complaint is the shoulders are a ~little~ more aggressive than the look on the model (like puffier). But once summer comes around I think I will def be renting again to wear with sandals and a straw hat
